name: Deep Breath (TheXaver)
description:
This Game is about a couple.

How are hiking in the woods, but an unfortunate thing happens. 

Both of them have to, do everything to get along.

Have to look around and solve easy puzzles, with both of them.

This is my first jam, I hope you can enjoy the game as much as I loved making it.

Ps: My English is not perfect at all, so sorry if it makes you cringe...
